response.overview: Through its little screen, what kind of world does a Game Boy see as it records? As a child, the Game Boy was my most faithful companion at my hospital bedside. Years later, lying in a hospital room once again for surgery, my father couldn't be there because of other obligations. So I brought it with me, hoping to capture this journey through its tiny screen.
response.title: The 8-bit diary of Dad and me

release_dates.note: Taipei International Golden Short Film Awards
